base_description: Gray rectangular box with knobs and protrusions.
part_description: Includes four knobs on top, two protruding handles on front, and a rectangular body.
internal_interaction_description: The knobs on top likely control internal mechanisms, possibly adjusting settings or functions. The handles may be connected to internal latches or supports, enabling opening or securing of the box.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, with knobs allowing user interaction for adjustments. Handles enable carrying or repositioning, suggesting portability and ease of access to contents.
